data.text:
We want at least 100,000 young people to be able to take part in the #EUSolidarityCorps by the end of 2020. 
€44 million will be set aside from our #EUBudget to create more opportunities for young people willing to engage in solidarity activities → https://t.co/lk3z6ivDyr https://t.co/77wW9gwLbi

🇪🇺 🇮🇹 Flags at half-mast in solidarity with the Italian people 
We express our deepest sympathy and sincere condolences to the families and friends of those who have died in the bridge collapse in #Genoa this week, and to the Italian people. https://t.co/K1aaiwrifI

In 1976, we were looking for the best analogy to describe how the European institutions work. For better or worse, we thought about the Eurobus... 
It's a bit unusual for us, so we thought to share it with you! 
#Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/tU6bVE4k54

With support from the European Fund for Strategic Investments, Énergies POSIT'IF helps apartment owners in the Parisian region improve the energy performance of their homes → https://t.co/MOG0HKTaqh #investEU https://t.co/2OFdVESRZE
It took us a few moments to figure out what it is. This is our "Object" for day 27 of #Archive30 https://t.co/J1ZgoNJifR

Do you want to be the next European champion of sustainable development? If your project empowers people and ensures inclusiveness, apply today to win our #EUSustainabilityAward!
Deadline for applications: 14 September → https://t.co/P3zL0eNe4c #SDGs https://t.co/WYlpzLaYX6

Thank you for your 4.6 million submissions to the public consultation on summertime arrangements! This is part of our assessment on whether or not the rules should be changed.
We will now analyse the responses and publish a report on the results in the coming weeks #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/Xt59GTRiYS

Today we commemorate one year since the tragic events in Barcelona and  Cambrils.
We pay tribute to the victims, the injured, their families and communities.
The EU remains united and resilient on all fronts in the fight against terrorism. https://t.co/7fs4B5cRHP

We talked to our archivists who work behind the scenes to preserve EU history! They talk about how they started, digitisation and their book recommendations too. Day 26 of #Archives30 https://t.co/L5m7j1mLaR

Ever heard of ink blotters?
They're used to absorb excess ink when writing with fountain pens – especially important when you are signing international treaties and agreements! #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/053jSDyynd

data.text:
Nothing to declare! Nothing to worry! 
A reminder from decades ago when all this was made possible, for day 25 of #Archives30. https://t.co/2OckHKgIiE

Lactose intolerant or any other food allergy?
If you're worried about what’s in the food you're buying, you can trust the special EU labels, as they list all of the allergens! 🍴
Find out more about food safety in the EU → https://t.co/UdrKeZEPa0 #EUandME https://t.co/LoSGm7wH7U

EU funding backs an agreement to provide €100 million in loans for SMEs in Finland.
As of July, the #JunckerPlan is now set to trigger €7.6 billion in investments in Finland and €335 billion across the EU. 🇪🇺 
https://t.co/bw5sumy0nZ #InvestEU #EFSI https://t.co/2C7obTxNdM

The Treaties of Rome laid the foundation for the Europe that we know today. 
In 2007, citizens celebrated the diversity of cultures, ideas and traditions in the EU. It is our entry for day 24 of the #Archive30 challenge! https://t.co/srNvifymkh
Almost 4 times as many humanitarian aid workers were killed in 2017 as in 1998. #NotATarget https://t.co/0YZPAKLVaz

On 29 May 1986, the European flag was raised for the first time outside our building at a ceremony to celebrate its official adoption.
More #EUarchives in "The European Commission, History and memories of an institution" → https://t.co/Wjj3iTSDU1 #Archives30 #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/23tyCQyZV3

data.text: The #CustomsUnion was still in its infancy in 1970, the year this animation was made. What better way to remind us that travelling has become easier and that we no longer need to worry about customs checks! #EuropeForCulture #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/qJxt7ApTyy

The #EUelections2019 will be held on 23-26 May 2019.
This time we are not just asking you to vote, we are also asking you to help to persuade others to vote too. Because when everybody votes, everybody wins. 
This time, I’m voting → https://t.co/KWZvPLeMUV https://t.co/xwACpsdIEm

Why do we need to save the Danube sturgeon?
Today this amazing fish is threatened with extinction. It has survived the dinosaurs but it is now facing the combined dangers of illegal fishing and fragmentation of its habitat. #savethesturgeon
Learn more → https://t.co/h8uAajdB6h https://t.co/mmHXa4O0NW

data.text: Which countries are the EU's largest ice cream producers? 🍦 https://t.co/b4hryG3do4 @EU_Eurostat https://t.co/y0nejIu8fs

Beelitzer Spargel 🇩🇪
Choucroute d'Alsace 🇫🇷
Pitina 🇮🇹
Mergelland 🇳🇱
Ribeiras do Morrazo 🇪🇸
All these EU products are registered as protected geographical indications Labels not only guarantee #EUQuality they also preserve traditional know-hows → https://t.co/8B4CSBxDgD https://t.co/nORYnDpuKK

data.text:
Europe is celebrating the European Year of Cultural Heritage with flying colours!
Don’t be blue,
Just paint the town red,
And be tickled pink,
That’s how we give the green light to a colourful #EuropeForCulture!
Learn more → https://t.co/di8NP4DTe1 https://t.co/Zaomecw0mV

GDP rose by 0.4% in both the euro area and the EU28 during the second quarter of 2018, compared with the previous quarter, according to @EU_Eurostat 
In the first quarter of 2018, GDP had also grown by 0.4% → https://t.co/ie5Uu941y8 https://t.co/xoItMCcy0N

We stand by the Indonesian people affected by the recent earthquakes in #Lombok. 
Additional emergency assistance will provide crucial support to the most vulnerable among the affected people through this difficult time. https://t.co/455197qd1m https://t.co/lGbuwAnbNH

EU funding will support a Nordlink interconnector with a €100 million @EIB investment in @TenneT_DE
The 624-km electricity interconnector will link Norway and Germany across the North Sea, improving diversification and security of supply→ https://t.co/455197qd1m #InvestEU #EFSI https://t.co/0UjnVzvwP7

Today, we take next step in infringement procedure to protect the independence of the Polish Supreme Court. The Polish law is incompatible with EU law as it undermines the principle of judicial independence, including the irremovability of judges → https://t.co/74qrTdtStp https://t.co/GGQJM5GTqu

Resist the seductive powers of #SingleUsePlastic charmers, the plastic bottles – and dump them before they dump you! 
More on the EU #PlasticsStrategy → https://t.co/43RMH8jiax #ReadyToChange https://t.co/gFF3Q1qbjc

A "European village" in Rome! 
In 2007, citizens celebrated the 50th anniversary of the Treaties of Rome. 
European unity started as the dream of a few, and it became the hope of the many. #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/svkffZ0EIw

At least 70% of construction waste should be recyclable by 2020. ♻️
A new study looks at the recycling infrastructure needed and how EU funding can foster investment in #CircularEconomy projects → https://t.co/hgR9i0gEzO  #investEU https://t.co/Zw1SmIR3xE

A call for all innovators!
Can you develop a solution for launching light satellites into orbit? 🛰️
One that’s innovative, implementable, affordable in development, exploitation and commercially viable? 
Apply today for #eicHorizonPrize → https://t.co/R7i7vWUaqt https://t.co/94wZDapf41

A self-portrait for day 23 of #Archive30. This picture was taken at an archive storage facility near Brussels. Do you work at an archive and have an interesting picture to share? https://t.co/o0U38k5sER

We are connecting Europe and Latin America!
11 research networks have signed a contract to build an underwater fibre optic cable in the Atlantic Ocean. We support the project with €26.5 million from #HorizonEU, #Copernicus and cooperation instruments → https://t.co/cIRISdTTLh https://t.co/x2ko025XXs

We are following the Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo very closely.
Our humanitarian experts have been dispatched to the areas plagued by the virus, and are working closely together with other emergency response actors → https://t.co/cIRISdTTLh https://t.co/iv4f5FhAhN

What would you change in your life now for a low-carbon future? 
Check out our survey on a long-term strategy for carbon emissions → https://t.co/hOhMQEZYg6 #EUHaveYourSay
Our archive service has preserved more than 60 years of history. It is good to look back and reflect on "where it all started" for day 22 of #Archive30! https://t.co/o2txJKNa1a

Our #EUarchives unit is now going vertical – already seven metres high! 
This is our team at the  archive storage facility near Brussels. #Archive30 https://t.co/jCYWXZK7Hq

data.text: Tap water is healthy, cheap and good for our planet. By drinking tap water we can all help cut down on plastic waste. https://t.co/DKL8yLBoxQ  #DrinkingWaterEU #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/cO4Avi69bn

Don't wait until the last minute to register for paid traineeships at the European Commission! 
Apply for the March 2019 session by the end of August → https://t.co/EH3wA7xYFE https://t.co/cMGcpeZw9I

We consult citizens and experts before, during, and even after policymaking.
Do you know you can give your opinion in any of these stages of EU legislation? Share your ideas in the public consultation: https://t.co/sn01yXbGWV #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/DUGBYMIU0I

You're in safe hands doing business in the EU.
The #CustomsUnion turns 50 this year. Learn more about what Customs Union does for your business → https://t.co/YnmaX6YGGF  #50CU https://t.co/0wCIuX7VJr

data.text:
This is the final stretch in our #Archive 30 challenge! 
We found some amazing gems from our #EUarchives, you wouldn't miss them for the world...
Have a look at our Twitter moment here → https://t.co/YIylEbl1c2 https://t.co/8AWGpuHyQe

For Finnish 🇫🇮 youth, all the information and advice they need regarding their work or training choices is available at One-Stop Guidance Centres. With help from the EU 🇪🇺, 40 such centres were set up to serve 100 municipalities. https://t.co/DVgqtVorCO #investEU #YouthDay https://t.co/Ayfmjh4slR

data.text: Happy International #YouthDay! This year’s theme is #SafeSpaces4Youth. Safe spaces can include civic, public, planned physical spaces and digital spaces, like the #EUandME website (https://t.co/2emgKflUH6), allowing you to engage deeper in political, civic and social matters. @UN https://t.co/Rxm53tX7Du

We officially opened our historical #EUarchives to the public in June 1983. 
The goal was to encourage research into European history, to promote public interest in the building of Europe and to lead to greater transparency in operations of the European institutions. #Archive30 https://t.co/OhSREf5mCl

Investing in Europe’s future. 
Getting projects off the ground. 
Boosting job creation and making a difference locally.
The European Fund for Strategic Investments has made a clear impact on the EU economy ↓ #investEU #EFSI https://t.co/IPsBpXhIHs

To boost connectivity and security within the #WesternBalkans region and with the EU, we provide grants for 11 high-priority transport projects worth €190 million, which can leverage up to €1 billion in loans.
For the digital agenda, €30 million for broadband investments. https://t.co/AjRrO40rja

This paper entitled "Production, industrial change and the way of life of European consumer" surprised us a few times and it became "our favourite".  The perfect choice for day 21 #Archive30. https://t.co/M0frfG0g79

Do you know about the EU Ecolabel?
681 hotels and campsites across Europe have received it, representing strong commitments on electricity, water, waste management, air quality.
Check them out here → https://t.co/3EsxDElroT https://t.co/ylR9xy9MBF

How to improve performance of complex machinery like aircrafts and wind turbines? Portuguese 🇵🇹-based Critical Materials analyses structural elements of complex instruments and provides innovative solutions to high-tech sectors. https://t.co/LHBu6spctD #investEU https://t.co/UAQglF2MIL

Did you know?
As an EU citizen you have the right to vote and to stand as a candidate in European Parliament and local elections no matter where you live in the EU! Find out more → https://t.co/CAaDzBrdo8 #EUandME https://t.co/1T68XZ06vO

Almost 72,000 young people registered to the #EUSolidarityCorps since its launch in 2016. We aim at 100,000 by the end of 2020!
We are setting aside €44 million from our #EUbudget and call for organisations to submit their project proposals → https://t.co/lk3z6ivDyr https://t.co/Q4Gc8n5LRe

Malta became the 22nd country to join the European Public Prosecutor's Office – to protect the EU budget against fraud, operational by end 2020.
Countries participating:
🇦🇹
🇧🇪
🇧🇬
🇭🇷
🇨🇾
🇨🇿
🇪🇪
🇫🇮
🇫🇷
🇩🇪

🇮🇹

🇱🇺
🇲🇹
🇳🇱
🇵🇹

🇸🇮

You are 18 and can’t wait to discover Europe?
You want to visit the European Capital of Culture?
Go to a festival, a museum, a natural park?
Next fall, we will launch a new call for #DiscoverEU passes.
Meanwhile, check our first travellers’ best moments ↓
https://t.co/AZFgNkHOLF

500,000 tonnes of EU plastic waste end up in the sea every year.
Building on our #PlasticsStrategy, we're tackling 10 single-use plastic products and fishing gear that account for 70% of the marine litter in Europe. We can only solve this urgent issue together. #CircularEconomy https://t.co/A9094OUzHW

Are we in the future yet?
In 1978, Jacques Delors, who would go on to become the President of the  Commission in 1985, envisioned data processing, computer technology, online shopping and much more in this paper.
Full report here → https://t.co/azi1bRRpXR #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/YPCkwNkayi

Are you #ReadyToChange your relationship with plastics?
Learn how to resist the seductive powers of this week's invasive charmers, the single use plastic cutlery – and dump them before they dump you! 
Watch more → https://t.co/LP7TM7uRST https://t.co/yrl8jYaO6U
We need to get together to build a happier future – message from 1970s. For day 20 of #Archive30! https://t.co/za0yiy7hPu

Digitised documents need migration every few years whereas microfiches can preserve documents for a century. It is the "perfect tool" for archival services to store documents. Our choice for day 19 of #Archive30. https://t.co/jBNUk2iY4x

We are supporting Bosnia and Herzegovina in managing migration flows with additional €6 million, to improve:
→ Capacity for identification, registration, referral of third-country nationals crossing border
→ Basic services
→ Border control
https://t.co/GTtoklvBed #MigrationEU https://t.co/Cxwnn0UL2G

The #EUSolidarityCorps is much more than only volunteering. 
It also puts in practice European solidarity and creates opportunities for young people to develop their skills and increase their future labour market prospects.
Learn more in our factsheet ↓ https://t.co/xQpdWpE1O2

Almost 72,000 young people registered to the #EUSolidarityCorps since its launch in 2016. We aim at 100,000 by the end of 2020!
Today, we are setting aside €44 million from our #EUbudget and call for organisations to submit their project proposals → https://t.co/lk3z6ivDyr https://t.co/QsuJ5n1QDp

Global health security is a matter of universal concern and a key priority for us.
Under the #JunckerPlan, we are supporting a €30 million loan for a biotechnology company in Denmark, for the development of vaccines & innovative therapies → https://t.co/KaB8qbzPVz #investEU https://t.co/raDh3G2jyr

@orejer7 Hi, we appreciate your interest. A new #DiscoverEU application round with at least 5,000 tickets will take place in autumn 2018, stay tuned! In the meantime, pursue your passion with #EUandMe: https://t.co/2emgKfDvyE Best, the Social Media Team

data.text:
Something fun for today #Archive30! 
In the midst of the 70s energy crisis, this animated cartoon of the European community foresaw our current challenges and advocated for a #CleanEnergyEU and #CircularEconomy! #EUarchives https://t.co/O1LNbDD97F

Diversification is an important element for ensuring the security of gas supply 
in the EU.
EU imports of #LNG from the U.S. have increased from 0 to 2.8 billion cubic meters since 2016.
We are ready to facilitate more imports → https://t.co/Ossq9MtT6I
#EUtrade 🇪🇺🇺🇸 https://t.co/lkrrgjuqfB
This is a text tweet https://t.co/ODH0rhIMEG

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.
entity.name: Travel Actions

data.text:
15,000 young people are travelling around the EU this summer with #DiscoverEU passes. 
They are enjoying Europe’s cultural richness, freedom of movement, being immersed in the EU's diversity and making new friends.
Have a look at their best moments ↓
https://t.co/AZFgNkHOLF

The EU is the world's most open market for African exports.
Today, Gambia became the 14th West African country to sign the region-to-region Economic Partnership Agreement with the EU.

More information about #EUtrade with West Africa → https://t.co/Zdloa8W41v https://t.co/xrjTVlJB1E

Growing exports of U.S. LNG, if priced competitively, could play an increasing and strategic role in EU gas supply; but the U.S. needs to play its role in doing away with red tape restrictions on LNG exports.
Both sides have much to gain by working together in the energy field.

The EU and the U.S. will therefore work to facilitate trade in liquefied natural gas.
The EU is ready to facilitate more imports of liquefied natural gas from the U.S. and this is already the case.

data.text:
President @JunckerEU and President @realDonaldTrump agreed to strengthen EU-U.S. strategic cooperation with respect to energy.
In this context, the EU would import more LNG from the U.S. to diversify and render its energy supply more secure.

EU-U.S. Joint Statement of 25 July: EU imports of U.S. liquefied natural gas are on the rise.
Since arrival of the first U.S. LNG carrier in April 2016 and today, EU imports of LNG from the U.S. have increased from 0 to 2.8 billion cubic meters.
https://t.co/Ossq9MtT6I #EUtrade

What would make you start or support a European citizens’ initiative? 🇪🇺
Learn more about it here → https://t.co/T3GGefuoCo
#EUTakeTheInitiative #ECI #EUandME

Does your city promote accessibility for people with disabilities?
We want to recognise efforts made by cities to ensure equal access to all the resources and pleasures they can offer.
The #EUAccessCity Award is open for applications!
Apply here → https://t.co/8KvqwWhuYV https://t.co/ZJ6amVjkIE

1 in 10 pollinating insects is on the verge of extinction.
A third of bee and butterfly species are in decline.
Learn how our initiative will protect pollinators in the EU 🐝🌼 → https://t.co/GiweOtX11t #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/HuM7wu68Gs

What is the best way to store an important historical document?
Many archivists use microfiche which can store about 100 A4 pages on 1 microfiche!
You do need special computers to read them. #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/YLynJnnmmc

More on our follow-up → https://t.co/INGe1MNlEz #EUTakeTheInitiative #ECI #DrinkingWaterEU https://t.co/KobtmJOkUJ

data.text:
For more than 30 years, we have been working on high quality standards for #DrinkingWaterEU. 
This year, we took another step forward with new rules to guarantee the right to access safe drinking water for all Europeans → https://t.co/378yPWL7G5 https://t.co/FmlYevJyGK
A powerful gesture of reconciliation and friendship that forged the French-German relationship for day 18 of #Archive30. https://t.co/bAwY5bQ3fn

Support for victims of the #Lombok earthquake:
The EU's emergency Copernicus Satellite mapping system has been activated to help the Indonesian civil protection authorities. The first emergency assistance will help the most affected communities.
https://t.co/7Gm3JheGml https://t.co/PA1oI7O4S6

The European Fund for Strategic Investments #EFSI has made a clear impact on the real economy. 
It is expected to create 1.4 million jobs and increase EU GDP by 1.3% by 2020.

The main beneficiaries from #EFSI are ↓  #investEU https://t.co/weVnsXB26Y

data.text:
It's #InternationalCatDay
Our purry friend is getting ready for a trip. 
Did you know that EU citizens can travel easily with their pets. They just need a European #PetPassport 🇪🇺 https://t.co/dNizgfil0r 
#EUandME https://t.co/UEXzqMnKMd

We chose the obvious for the "friendship" challenge of #Archive30
The handshake of François Mitterrand and Helmut Kohl, is the symbolic gesture of Franco-German reconciliation. It took place in 1984 during a commemoration of the dead of the First World War. #EUarchives https://t.co/bw8vQmXG3b

data.text:
We love to hear about how you #discoverEU!
It looks like travellers had a really good time in July! Keep taking amazing photos and videos and enter competition in August
Here are the 4 winners of the July  📷 competition ↓ https://t.co/XNjXakmd8k

We talked to Europeans from various age groups about what the EU means to them. This "collection" reflecting our shared history and journey is perfect for day 17 of #Archive30.  https://t.co/ONoYlBZbX3
https://t.co/xapEN6X7CU

Many micro-entrepreneurs face difficulties in accessing credit from traditional banking sources. With the help of EU funding, 600 micro-enterprises in Latvia will get financial support over the next 3 years → https://t.co/p30nKX1QBa #investEU https://t.co/tDyaCJI9oH

We are backing the largest ever @EIB support for agri-business in Ireland, under the #JunckerPlan.
A €40 million financing will help an agri-technology company develop its research, development and growth plans, and increase its workforce → https://t.co/iwoAiGEqAT #investEU https://t.co/sUIlE7eGCL

Malta becomes 22nd country to join the European Public Prosecutor's Office, to protect the EU budget against fraud - operational by end 2020
Countries participating:
🇦🇹 🇧🇪 🇧🇬 🇭🇷 🇨🇾 🇨🇿 🇪🇪 🇫🇮 🇫🇷 🇩🇪 🇬🇷 🇮🇹 🇱🇻 🇱🇹 🇱🇺 🇲🇹 🇳🇱 🇵🇹 🇷🇴 🇸🇰 🇪🇸 🇸🇮 https://t.co/Sx8UM4CPRm
"Something big" - that was the #Archive30 challenge for day 16 and of course this special animation on European Coal and Steel Community fit the bill! https://t.co/Yw8EfMbkwu

Are you ready to change your relationship with plastics?
Learn how to resist the seductive powers of these invasive charmers, the #SingleUsePlastic cutlery – and dump them before they dump you!
Visit https://t.co/gGSpTy6Tia #ReadyToChange #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/EiootSteWI

We celebrated the 60 years of the European Union last year.
On this occasion, we interviewed 60 Europeans to get 60 personal stories about what the last 60 years of European integration meant to them
Our #EUarchives collection of testimonials → https://t.co/CaYqDMDwgH #Archive30 https://t.co/IhBrktyfrM

What do you think about the European Citizens’ Initiative as a tool? Do you have any questions or views on the process to organise an initiative? Share them with other EU citizens on the #ECI Forum → https://t.co/0jyFrDnpJD  #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/7ceMee3pKE

Today the EU's updated Blocking Statute enters into force to mitigate the impact of re-imposed US sanctions on the interests of EU companies doing legitimate business in Iran. 
Part of our support for continued full implementation of the #JCPOA #IranDeal.
https://t.co/n4Y0SH6SRe

What do you this about the European Citizens’ Initiative as a tool? Do you have any questions or views on the process to organise an initiative? Share them with other EU citizens on the #ECI Forum → https://t.co/0jyFrDnpJD #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/bgX2EiH8TS
On day 15 of the #Archive30 challenge we shared a beautiful "pattern" showcasing Indian culture. What do you think this pattern depicts? https://t.co/yC9yKb43if

The European Fund for Strategic Investments #EFSI has mobilised €335 billion in additional investment across the EU since July 2015. 
It has supported at least 750,000 jobs in the EU.
More results → https://t.co/T7hKFvSsaj 
#investEU https://t.co/ZrpgmXTLv7
As "typography" was the theme for day 14 of #Archive30 challenge, we shared with you our special font that offers better readability! https://t.co/QOCqOqLdjO

Whistleblowers should not have to pay for their actions with their jobs, reputations, or their lives.
That's why we are proposing new measures to strengthen protection for whistleblowing in the EU.
#whistleblower https://t.co/YAv0i56lL7
